about.summary: A Python package providing buffer compression and transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication applications.

name: numcodecs
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.0.1" %}

package:
  name: numcodecs
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: numcodecs-v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/n/numcodecs/numcodecs-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5b2095bfec7771be7ea66c27534db8bddef1848ed34d09b7dd28228e952d5076

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - cython
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python
    - numpy

test:
  requires:
    - nose
  imports:
    - numcodecs
    - numcodecs.blosc
  commands:
    - nosetests -v numcodecs

about:
  home: https://github.com/alimanfoo/numcodecs
  license: MIT
  summary: A Python package providing buffer compression and transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication applications.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - alimanfoo
